allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore(pre-commit): update hooks and fix formatting

Update pre-commit-hooks v5.0.0 → v6.0.0 and commitlint v9.19.0 → v9.23.0
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --amend -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore(pre-commit): update hooks and fix formatting

Update pre-commit-hooks v5.0.0 → v6.0.0 and commitlint v9.19.0 → v9.23.0

Update GitHub Actions:
- actions/checkout v3 → v4
- actions/setup-python v4 → v5
- pre-commit/action v3.0.0 → v3.0.1
- Python 3.11 → 3.12
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --amend -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore(pre-commit): update hooks and fix formatting

Update pre-commit-hooks v5.0.0 → v6.0.0 and commitlint v9.19.0 → v9.23.0

Update GitHub Actions:
- actions/checkout v3 → v4
- actions/setup-python v4 → v5
- pre-commit/action v3.0.0 → v3.0.1
- Python 3.11 → 3.14
EOF
)")
